title: Valkyrie: The Vampire Princess 3
description: SINOPSIS Valkyrie returns to the planet Earth.She backs to live together with her mother and with human kind.What she doesn't know your Earth’s existence’ll never be the same after she to have become an immortal.She’ll have to choose between to remain on Planet Earth or even to return to the Planet Neptune. That is, where her father the vampires’s king, reigns.
author: Pet Torres
